entry.title: Bob Wig
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Wig
Price: 198.00 - 315.00 (6 variants)

Bob Wig

Our Bob Wig is the perfect style for everyday wear. Leave it straight, wand or curl it to switch it up. Our 100% human lace front units can be coloured, styled and parted like your own hair. 

Texture: Straight
Colour: Natural
Lace: Lace Front
Hairline: Pre-plucked with baby hairs

Lace Front Wig

Constructed with a 13 x 4 frontal piece and wefts at the back. It can be parted from ear to ear across the pre-plucked natural hairline. Our Lace Front Wigs come with adjustable straps and combs.

More

Check out our blog post & video, What is a Lace/Lace Front Wig? for more information on this product! Check out our length chart to get an ideal of the length you need. 

Treat this hair as if it were your own. Feel free to wash, curl, straighten and style it however you want.

Our lace front & full lace wigs are a great solution for those looking to look amazing on the fly.

entry.title: Deep Curly Wig
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Wig
Price: 260.00 - 790.00 (29 variants)

Deep Curly Wig

Our Deep Curly Lace Front or Full Lace Wig is full of body. Leave it curly for that beach girl look or straighten it out. Our 100% human lace front and full lace wigs can be coloured, styled and parted like your own hair. 

Texture: Deep Curly
Colour: Natural
Lace: Lace Front or Full Lace
Hairline: Pre-plucked with baby hairs

Lace Front Wig

Constructed with a 13 x 4 frontal piece and wefts at the back. It can be parted from ear to ear across the pre-plucked natural hairline. Our Lace Front Wigs come with adjustable straps and combs.

Full Lace Wig

This wig can be parted anywhere. With this wig, you can do ponytails, braids and many other versatile styles. Our Full Lace wigs are do not have clips or straps however they can be added.

More

Check out our blog post & video, What is a Lace/Lace Front Wig? for more information on this product! Check out our length chart to get an ideal of the length you need. 

Treat this hair as if it were your own. Feel free to wash, curl, straighten and style it however you want.

Our lace front & full lace wigs are a great solution for those looking to look amazing on the fly.

entry.title: Loose Wave Wig
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Wig
Price: 260.00 - 790.00 (29 variants)

Loose Wave Wig

Our Loose Wave Base Wig is full of body. The texture is a large wave. It can be set curly or straight and you can wash it for it to return to it’s original texture. Our 100% human lace front and full lace wigs can be coloured, styled and parted like your own hair. 

Texture: Loose Wave
Colour: Natural
Lace: Lace Front or Full Lace
Hairline: Pre-plucked with baby hairs

Lace Front Wig

Constructed with a 13 x 4 frontal piece and wefts at the back. It can be parted from ear to ear across the pre-plucked natural hairline. Our Lace Front Wigs come with adjustable straps and combs.

Full Lace Wig

This wig can be parted anywhere. With this wig, you can do ponytails, braids and many other versatile styles. Our Full Lace wigs are do not have clips or straps however they can be added.

Treat this hair as if it were your own. Feel free to wash, curl, straighten and style it however you want.

Our lace front & full lace wigs are a great solution for those looking to look amazing on the fly.
